channel.title: 718 RSPS Question(s)
channel.description:
Hey Mopar!
Im trying to change the direction of my spirit tree (which im using for teleports) I have EntityDirection implemented in my server, for NPC's but im having a hard time with objects.
[code]//Spirit tree World.spawnObject(new WorldObject(1317, 10, 0, 2822, 3861, 0), true);[/code]
And also does anyone have the correct render animations for General Graardor?
Thanks in advance!

item.title: 718 RSPS Question(s)
item.dc:creator: @fpsnipmob fpsnipmob
item.description:
@fpsnipmob wrote:

Just did, and its still stuck facing north

EDIT: I got it!! i was changing the 0 to 1,2,3 etc… when actually its set up as. -3,-2,-1,0

Read full topic

item.title: 718 RSPS Question(s)
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“fpsnipmob, post:3, topic:553211”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=672128.msg4495157#msg4495157 date=1441562644]
Have you looked in the WorldObject class to read the constructor you’re using, so you know what each of those values do?

Because I’m pretty sure one of them (I’m guessing the 0 after 10) is related to the object face.
[/quote]

Yes thats what it says, but no matter what i change it to, i cant get the tree to rotate at all i am trying it with and without eclipse.[/quote]
Try spawning a tree in a new location but with rotation and see if it works.
if it does something is overriding the one you’re spawning

Read full topic
